message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm only able to pay up to $10,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position. I'm willing to come down to $11,000, but I can't go any lower than that. This product is worth a lot, and I'm confident you'll find it extremely valuable. Let's see if we can make this work.
